document_data.name: Ornrim
document_data.mainbody: '''Ornrim''' was a fisherman in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He possessed some nets, strongly implying he was a fisherman.
document_data.History:
[[Andor]]'s body was found tangled up in his nets in mid-to-late 1357 [[DR]], a fact known to few other than [[Belgon Bradasker]].

His neck was broken two months prior to the late end of {{yearlink|1357}}, with a single noblewoman as a witness: [[Tessaril Winter]]. He went missing afterwards.
